products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation. Features crystal-clear audio, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable over-ear design. Perfect for music enthusiasts, gamers, and professionals who need immersive sound experience.
products.specifications: Bluetooth 5.2, ANC, 30hr battery, Water-resistant, Foldable design, Memory foam ear cups

products.name: Professional Running Shoes
products.description: High-performance running shoes designed for marathon runners and fitness enthusiasts. Features advanced cushioning technology, breathable mesh upper, and superior traction for all weather conditions.
products.specifications: Sizes: 7-12, Colors: Black/Red/Blue, Weight: 280g, Drop: 8mm, Material: Engineered mesh

products.name: Programmable Coffee Maker
products.description: Smart coffee maker with built-in grinder and programmable settings. Features thermal carafe, strength control, and auto-shutoff. Brews perfect coffee every time with precision temperature control.
products.specifications: Capacity: 12 cups, Thermal carafe, Built-in grinder, Programmable timer, Water filter

products.name: Smart Fitness Watch
products.description: Advanced smartwatch with health monitoring, GPS, and smartphone connectivity. Tracks workouts, sleep, heart rate, and blood oxygen levels. Water-resistant up to 50 meters.
products.specifications: 1.4" AMOLED, GPS, Heart rate monitor, SpO2, 7-day battery, 5ATM water resistant

products.name: Premium Yoga Mat
products.description: Eco-friendly yoga mat with superior grip and cushioning. Made from natural tree rubber with moisture-wicking surface. Perfect for all yoga styles and fitness routines.
products.specifications: Thickness: 6mm, Size: 72x24", Material: Natural rubber, Non-slip surface

products.name: High-Speed Blender
products.description: Professional-grade blender with 1800W motor and precision controls. Perfect for smoothies, soups, nut butters, and frozen desserts. Features tamper tool and pre-programmed settings.
products.specifications: 1800W motor, 64oz BPA-free pitcher, 8 speeds, Pre-programmed settings, Pulse function

products.name: Gaming Laptop
products.description: High-performance gaming laptop with RTX graphics, high refresh rate display, and advanced cooling system. Perfect for gaming, content creation, and demanding applications.
products.specifications: RTX 4070, Intel i7-13700H, 16GB DDR5, 1TB SSD, 15.6" 240Hz, RGB keyboard

products.name: Hiking Backpack
products.description: Durable hiking backpack with ergonomic design and multiple compartments. Features rain cover, hydration bladder compatibility, and adjustable suspension system for all-day comfort.
products.specifications: Capacity: 40L, Water-resistant, Hip belt pockets, Hydration compatible, Rain cover included

products.name: Air Purifier
products.description: HEPA air purifier with smart sensors and app control. Removes 99.97% of airborne particles, including allergens, dust, and smoke. Covers up to 500 square feet.
products.specifications: HEPA filter, Carbon filter, Smart sensors, App control, Auto mode, Night mode

products.name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
products.description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and transparency mode. Features wireless charging case, 8-hour battery life, and IPX4 water resistance.
products.specifications: Active noise cancellation, Transparency mode, 24hr total battery, Wireless charging, IPX4 water resistant

products.name: Adjustable Dumbbell Set
products.description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbell set with quick-change weight system. Adjusts from 5 to 50 lbs per dumbbell in 2.5 lb increments. Perfect for home gyms.
products.specifications: Weight: 5-50lbs each, Increments: 2.5lbs, Material: Steel/composite, Storage tray included

products.name: Robot Vacuum
products.description: Smart robot vacuum with LiDAR navigation and self-emptying base. Maps your home for efficient cleaning and automatically empties dustbin after each session.
products.specifications: LiDAR navigation, Self-emptying base, App control, 150min runtime, Carpet detection

products.name: 4K Action Camera
products.description: Waterproof 4K action camera with image stabilization and multiple mounting options. Perfect for sports, adventures, and underwater recording.
products.specifications: 4K60 video, HyperSmooth 4.0, Waterproof 10m, Touch screen, Voice control

products.name: Mountain Bike
products.description: Full-suspension mountain bike with carbon frame and hydraulic disc brakes. Designed for trail riding with 29-inch wheels and 12-speed drivetrain.
products.specifications: Carbon frame, 29" wheels, 150mm travel, Hydraulic brakes, 12-speed, Dropper post

products.name: Smart Refrigerator
products.description: French door smart refrigerator with touch screen, interior camera, and voice control. Keeps food fresh longer with precise temperature control and humidity drawers.
products.specifications: 28 cu.ft., Touch screen, Interior cameras, Voice control, Ice/water dispenser, Energy Star
